name: FPS Bullethell
description:
This is a quick FPS bullethell I made for the Mix and GameJam. This is my first gamejam so I wasn't sure what to expect.

This was a fun project I built in Unity by myself. I don't have any experience with art, sound, or level design but it was fun learning about them.

Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to walk
  • LMB to fire

Power Ups:

  • Green ball: speed increase
  • Black ball: damage increase
  • Pink cube: health recovery
